name: OnCall Centre
description:
Welcome to On Call Centre.  We provide telephone call answering services and inbound call centre services for business owners, customer support departments, and fundraising teams.
With On Call Centre, there is always a fluent French/English bilingual human voice with a beating heart answering your customers’ calls 24x7, which means you deliver a high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty without increasing head count or capital costs—ultimately ensuring repeat business and goal achievement. Our success is proven over 40 years of serving small, medium and large businesses in a plethora of sectors in Ottawa, Montreal, Toronto (Canada), the United States, and around the world.
